UPDATE tb_basic_config as `tbc`
`tbc`.`id` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.id},
`tbc`.`groupId` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.groupId},
`tbc`.`title` = NULL,
`tbc`.`title` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.title},

`tbc`.`status` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.status},
`tbc`.`sort` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.sort},
`tbc`.`picker` = NULL,
`tbc`.`picker` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.picker},
`tbc`.`componentData` = NULL,
`tbc`.`componentData` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.componentData},
`tbc`.`createdAt` = '',
`tbc`.`createdAt` = #{tbBasicConfigPo.createdAt},

mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbc`.* FROM tb_basic_config as `tbc`
GROUP BY
`tbc`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbc`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_config as `tbc`
GROUP BY
`tbc`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbc`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_config as `tbc`
GROUP BY
`tbc`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigPo.havingClause}

HAVING #{tbBasicConfigPo.havingClause}
